snippet: A warming climate and an eroding winter are doing grievous harm to the species, which is dying off across North America.
abstract: Editorial notes moose are dying off across North America for a number of reasons, most of which can be linked to a warming climate and an eroding winter; contends collapse in moose numbers is sign of an entire ecosystem caught up in changes largely brought about by human activity.
lead_paragraph: A warming climate and an eroding winter are doing grievous harm to the species, which is dying off across North America.
